faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: Do you charge for the appraisal?
faq.answer1: No. The initial visit and appraisal are completely free and without commitment. We only charge a commission when the sale is completed.
faq.answer2: We prefer to work exclusively because it allows us to dedicate more resources to marketing your property, but we analyze each case individually.
faq.question3: How long does it take to sell a property?
faq.answer3: Time varies depending on location, price and characteristics. Thanks to our international network, many well-priced properties sell in 3 to 6 months.
faq.answer4: We specialize in Valle de Uco (Tupungato, Tunuyán, San Carlos) but we also work with properties in Luján de Cuyo, Maipú and San Rafael.
faq.question5: Can I sell if I still have active production?
faq.answer5: Yes, no problem. In fact, farms with active production are usually more attractive to investors because they demonstrate immediate profitability.

proof.title: Experts in Tupungato and Tunuyán
